abstract: To place children of Brit Univ Women Fed members in U S homes
snippet: The American Association of University Women, at the request of its sister organization, the British Federation of University Women, has agreed to find comparable homes in the United States for 3,000 to 6,000 children of British university graduat...

headline.main: UNIVERSITY WOMEN TO HELP EVACUEES; American Association Tells British Group It Will Place 3,000 to 6,000 Children

lead_paragraph: The American Association of University Women, at the request of its sister organization, the British Federation of University Women, has agreed to find comparable homes in the United States for 3,000 to 6,000 children of British university graduates for the duration of the present European War.
